education.name: KTH Royal Institute of Technology
education.description: Bachelor's and Master's degree (Civilingenjör) in Computer Science. Focus on Human-Computer Interaction (HCI). It took slightly longer than expected, but I quickly realized that contributing to the chapter was worth every last second spent.

education.name: Tyresö Gymnasium
education.description: Studied for 3 years, as most people do, while at the same time starting and finishing the UF (Young Entrepreneurship) company called Sea Inventions. We finished top 3 in 3 categories within the Stockholm region. Best Product (1st), Best Showcase (1st) and Best Webpage (3rd). We also won some local competitions.
education.snippet: This is where I realized I wanted to continue at KTH.

education.name: EBS Bartender School
education.description: Intense one-month course during the summer of 2009. Head of education was Johannes Kinch. Finished with highest possible grades and had an overall awesome and evolving experience. Towards the end I almost understood danish!
education.snippet: Went on a one-month summer course.

work.name: Spotify
work.description: Making sure that the relations between Spotify and KTH stay awesome! Worked on the Student TechFest among other huge events which made sure that everyone studying at KTH will consider Spotify their top employer when they graduate. I also helped develop their street team program.
work.snippet: Joined the band, spread the word and had a blast.

work.name: IT, Swedish Trade Federation
work.description: Making sure that computers, as well as everything revolving around them, works flawlessly for the employees at Svensk Handel. Anything and everything between reconfiguring networks and servers and searching for errors in different environments to making sure the computers and gadgets are actually plugged into the sockets.
work.snippet: I love helping people, better yet, making them understand.

work.name: Klubbmästare DKM
work.description: Responsible for the overall organization and leadership within DKM (Datas Klubbmästeri). DKM is a group of students at the computer science chapter of KTH that arrange weekly pubs as well as other major events for the students of the chapter. Before taking charge as klubbmästare, I was responsible for all graphics produced by DKM.
work.snippet: Made friends for life and organized a lot of awesome events.

work.name: Art Director, Univeristy Star League
work.description: In charge of every piece of graphics seen, as well as the look and feel of the production, in the first season of University Star League (a Starcraft 2 tournament for university students in Sweden). Among what was produced was a webpage, overlays for the livestream, advertisement (mousepads, posters, awards, cheques). I also acted as a graphical consultant for the entire production.
work.snippet: From zero to amazing. I was part of the start-up crew.

work.name: Teknikmagasinet
work.description: In-store salesman selling cool gadgets, gifts and other technical stuff over the counter.
work.snippet: Meeting customers rocked. I kinda miss it.

work.name: Graphical Artist, Bratt Trading
work.description: Designed and created their product catalogue for 2009.

software.IntelliJ: When I need to go deeper.
